page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Martin Hogan
page.description: Martin served in the military before getting Law and Business degrees. He has held executive roles in Multinational Pharma, Consulting and Security Companies before founding his first start-up in 2014, leading it to a successful exit in 2018. Building the Safe-Citizens Public Safety Platform™ has long been an ambition, now realised.

talk.title: Using Serverless to keep people safe in a dangerous world
talk.abstract: All of us here at Safe-Citizens are devoted to helping keep people safe in a sometimes challenging and dangerous world. To that end, we have designed a platform that utilises citizens mobile phones to alert them if they are in the vicinity of a potentially dangerous incident. The first platform specifically designed with public safety in mind- utilising the best technology has to offer combined with very clever proprietary technology. Find out more about how we are using serverless to keep people safe in a dangerous world.
